participant_1.name: Alexandra
participant_1.personality: Energetic and competitive, always striving for excellence.
participant_1.background: I workout four hours a day. Gymnastics is my favorite sport. I'm a gold medalist Olympian. I love Italian food and garlic bread.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and confident, with a hint of charm.
participant_2.background: I graduated from Yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. My parents are very wealthy bankers. I grew up in Manhattan. I plan to go to business school next year. I drive a BMW.
